attributes.action: Get the government to take action against Perjury under Family Law
attributes.background:
When a Resident Parent goes to court & makes a statement or talks in court they do so under oath, when they lie in these statements they commit perjury under Family Law

If you report this to the police they don't listen to you and refuse to pursue your complaint.

rejection.details:
Perjury is already an offence. Taking action on allegations of perjry is therefore the responsibility of the police and the courts, not a decision for the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you want to make a complaint about the police, you can find more information here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/complaints
